name: BallRun (Lawless_Heaven)
description:
Welcome to Ballrun!!

We are a group of  University of Baltimore students excited to share our one-semester project from our multiplayer game design course.
Ballrun is a multiplayer game developed using Unity and hosted by Photon.  The goal of our game is to push the ball to the goal and compete to see which side can score the most !!! 

Control:

  1. WASD to move
  2. Shift to sprint
  3. Space to jump
  4. Num 1,2,3 for spicy emotes

We hope you enjoy our project XD
